div.p: CLIENTS PLEASE NOTE:
Here are the stories APTN Entertainment aims to cover over the next 24 hours. All times in GMT.
MONDAY 14 FEBRUARY
NEW YORK_ Sergio Hudson presents at NYFW
LOS ANGELES_ Dave Grohl explains the Foo Fighters' venture into horror films with 'Studio 666'
VARIOUS_ The stars of 'The Marvelous Mrs. Maisel' talk about Midge getting tough with her comedy in season 4 of the Prime Video series
BERLIN_ Writer/director Michael Koch presents his movie 'A Piece of Sky' in Berlin, which explores "young love in the alps" and the focus on patience and trust in relationships
NEW YORK_ Ad Age editor Jeanine Poggi talks about the buzziest Super Bowl ads after the big game
NEW YORK_ Carolina Herrera presents at NYFW
BERLIN_ Berlinale premiere for 'One Year One Night,' which looks at the aftermath of a couple who were present at the Bataclan attack and whether their lives will ever return to normal
LOS ANGELES_ New series 'Bel Air' puts a dramatic spin on the 'Fresh Prince' story
BERLIN_ 'The Outfit' premieres at the Berlin International Film Festival, starring Mark Rylance as an English tailor in the 1960s who becomes embroiled with a family of vicious gangsters
BERLIN_ Directed by Denis Cote, 'That Kind of Summer' premieres in Berlin and centers on three women invited to a facility to explore their sexual issues
CELEBRITY EXTRA
AUSTRALIA_ Oscar and BAFTA nominee Kodi-Smit McPhee looks back on his career to date, revealing what he's learned from co-stars Benedict Cumberbatch, Eric Bana and Viggo Mortensen
LOS ANGELES_ First female ensemble member among new 'Jackass' additions
BROADCAST VIDEO ALREADY AVAILABLE:
US_'Death on the Nile' tops a quiet box office weekend
NEW YORK_Designer Brandon Maxwell pays emotional tribute to his grandmother at runway show
INGLEWOOD_Country singer Mickey Guyton performs national anthem at Super Bowl
INGLEWOOD_Dr. Dre, Snoop Dogg, Eminem, Mary J. Blige, Kendrick Lamar and surprise performance by 50 Cent at Super Bowl LVI's halftime show
VENICE_Boats lit up in Venice for first weekend of carnival
BERLIN_ Machine Gun Kelly appears at world premiere of new drama 'Taurus' at Berlin International Film Festival
VALENCIA, SPAIN_ 'The Good Boss' starring Javier Bardem is big winner at Spain's Goya Awards
BEIJING_ Hardy few extol rewards of icy dip in Beijing lake
SANTIAGO, CHILE_ A picnic to celebrate equal marriage law in Chile
BERLIN_ Machine Gun Kelly experienced 'screen therapy' in 'cathartic' new movie 'Taurus'
